revised_title: A New Walnut Tree Species Discovered by Monsieur Reneaume
tldr: Monsieur Reneaume discovered a new species of walnut tree with unique leaf morphology. The tree has distinct leaf patterns and shapes, making it different from the common walnut tree. The new species is yet to bear fruit, but its leaves are used for ornamentation and its wood for working with. The author plans to publish a system explaining the unique leaf patterns of this tree and other plants.
